prop.name: publicDoc
prop.description: Whether the document will be loaded from the public folder of the team.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The document name. Leave empty for new documents. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $public
parameter.description: Set this to TRUE in order to load a public document from the library's Public folder.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description:
Only for public folders, use this attribute to specify the team to get the document from.
NOTE: This doesn't work when in secure mode, including applications.

method.name: create
method.description: Create a new document in the library.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document context. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove the document entry from the library and delete the document.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getRootDirectory
method.description: Create a new document in the library.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
